metadata.name: Suspicious File Download From IP Via Wget.EXE - Paths
metadata.comment: Detects potentially suspicious file downloads directly from IP addresses and stored in suspicious locations using Wget.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wget.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wget.exe') AND process.cmd_line rlike '://\[0-9\]\{1,3\}\\.\[0-9\]\{1,3\}\\.\[0-9\]\{1,3\}\\.\[0-9\]\{1,3\}' AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http')) AND process.cmd_line rlike '\\s-O\\s' AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--output-document')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\perflogs\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\help\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\temporary internet'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\favorites\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\favourites\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\contacts\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\pictures\\')))

output.summary: Detects potentially suspicious file downloads directly from IP addresses and stored in suspicious locations using Wget.exe
